about_the_game:
A raging monster without a roar just isn't the same. Who will feel the fear of facing down brutal beasts if they have nothing to say? Nobody! Lucky for you, this cornucopia of chilling growls, menacing snarls, and angry bellows will give voice to your meanest monsters. The sounds of twenty four fantasy creatures are at your disposal.

We've assembled a virtual zoo full of fantasy creatures to growl, snarl, and swipe their claws at the microphone so you can give voice to your own personal beastiary. Insectoids, aliens, creatures from the deep and powerful predators are all represented in the twenty four separate monsters (each with five or more sounds) that you will find in this pack. Wear protective gear and approach with caution.

This pack contains:

  • 235 SFX of fantasy creatures making noise, attacking, and eating!
  • .wav, M4a and .ogg formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in RPG Maker or the engine of your choice
  • Click the Online Manual URL to download a handy PDF with the pack's file names - a great way to get an idea of what's included in this pack!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Creature Feature SFX

package_groups.name: default

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Creature Feature SFX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
